ci_support_linux_64_channel_sourcesconda:
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,conda-forge/label/python_rc
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
fortran_compiler:
- gfortran
fortran_compiler_version:
- '14'
liblapack:
- 3.9.* *netlib
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.14.* *_cp314
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - python
  - channel_sources

about.description: OpenOrb (or OOrb) is an open-source orbit-computation package.
OpenOrb (or OOrb) is an open-source orbit-computation package.
OpenOrb (or OOrb) is an open-source orbit-computation package.

name: openorb

about.description: OpenOrb (or OOrb) is an open-source orbit-computation package.
OpenOrb (or OOrb) is an open-source orbit-computation package.

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: openorb
  version: 1.3.0

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/oorb/oorb/archive/refs/tags/v${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f725a4986e72a9e0ed5f2ca3a05ba17f3d5d6b39147e547e015c875281d4d018
  patches:
    - 0001-conda-compat.patch
    - 0002-use-conda-gfortran.patch
    - 0003-link-conda-prefix.patch
    - 0004-cstring-fixups.patch
    - 0005-configure.patch
    - 0006-makefile.patch

build:
  number: 1
  skip: win

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - numpy
    - make
    - meson
    - patch
    - ninja
    - pkg-config
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler('fortran') }}
  host:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - numpy
    - liblapack
  run:
    - python
    - openorb-data
    - openorb-data-de430

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - pyoorb
  - files:
      source:
        - python/test.py
    script:
      - python python/test.py

about:
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: An open-source orbit-computation package
  description: |
    OpenOrb (or OOrb) is an open-source orbit-computation package.
  homepage: https://github.com/oorb/oorb
  repository: https://github.com/oorb/oorb
  documentation: https://github.com/oorb/oorb/blob/master/README.md

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mjuric
    - bsipocz
    - rhiannonlynne
    - beckermr
